item.title: Microsoft Azure
item.description: Earners of the Azure Fundamentals certification have demonstrated foundational level knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.

item.title: Jenkins
item.description: In agile development practices, developers need to integrate their work frequently to fix bugs or to create a new feature or functionality.

item.title: SAFe Scaled Agile
item.description: A Certified SAFe 5 Practitioner (SP) is a SAFe team member professional responsible for using Scrum, Kanban, and XP in a SAFe environment.

item.title: OOP JAVA
item.description: Object-oriented programming SOLID Principles Best practices in OOP Architecture Exam task: implement backend for online store A lot of coding exercises GoF Design Patterns Clean Code Design in OOP

item.title: JAVA & C++
item.description: TestDome is a provider of high-quality online screening tests for knowledge workers.

item.title: Codin Game
item.description: CodinGame is a technology company editing an online platform for developers, allowing them to play with programming with increasingly difficult puzzles, to learn to code better with an online programming application supporting twenty-five programming languages, and to compete in multiplayer programming contests involving timed artificial intelligence, or code golf challenges.
